channel.title: Player Rights
channel.description: I'm pretty sure that this is both client and server sided so I wasn't quite sure where to put it. Right now the source I downloaded has some very weird icons for admin and mod, it's a leaf or something. I have the pictures that I want to be the icons in the correct folder but I was wondering which file dealt with the picture that appears next to your name. Also can anyone kind of hint me towards adding an icon next to a player's name for another feature such as donator. Thanks for all your help =)

item.title: Player Rights
item.dc:creator: @thebigpurpleglob thebigpurpleglob
item.description:
@thebigpurpleglob wrote:

.fub_File_store_32 > Sprites > Look for your current icon on the server, open up paste your new picture on save > compile.
(ALL DONE IN YOUR CLIENT FOLDER)

Read full topic
